works.description: The mere idea of spinning in this chair makes me feel the vertigo, but it’s in fact designed to energize and stimulate. Designed by Jaanus Osugaar, the Accelerator chair is designed to spin rather than rock. While a rocking chair relaxes and puts you at ease, the Accelerator spinning chair spins to offer you a playful, stimulating ride. The chair has six balls inside the base for the spins and a pair of built-in hand straps to keep you from falling out.
